summary: A set of helper modules that define custom Django template tags and nodes for the test suite, covering simple, assignment, inclusion, localization, escaping, and malformed tag scenarios to exercise the template rendering system.
business_intent: Enable comprehensive testing of Django's template tag infrastructure by supplying mock tag implementations that mimic normal, edgeâ€‘case, and error conditions, allowing the test framework to validate parsing, rendering, context handling, and internationalization behavior.
